channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Auto Delete Posts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Auto Delete Posts

item.title: CVE-2022-1779|2024-08-03T00:16:59.906Z -- unknown -- auto%20delete%20posts
item.description: The Auto Delete Posts WordPress plugin through 1.3.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack and delete specific posts, categories and attachments at once.
